name: BMR Rental Application Workshop
description: The SF LGBT Center educates San Franciscan renters about MOHCD’s BMR Rental Program and other affordable housing opportunities through the following services: - Below Market Rate (BMR) & Affordable Rental workshops - Individual rental counseling How to Apply: - To register for workshops, visit their events calendar. - To schedule a counseling appointment, send an email. Service Contact Information: - Email: FinancialServices@sfcenter.org
